params.blsKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass proof  of possession. 48 bytes.
params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 96 bytes.
params.sender: The address signed by the BLS key to generate the proof of possession.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.return: numerator/denominator of the computed quantity (not reduced).

getBitmapForInterval(uint256,uint256).details: startBlock and endBlock must be in the same epoch.The getParentSealBitmap precompile requires that startBlock must be within 4 epochs of  the current block.
getBitmapForInterval(uint256,uint256).return: The signature uptime bitmap for the specified interval.

params.blockNumber: Block number where epoch number is calculated.

getEpochSize().return: The current epoch size in blocks.

getVersionNumber().return: The storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

params.registryAddress: The address of the registry core smart contract.

isBitmapSetForInterval(uint256,uint256).return: True if the bitmap has been set for the specified interval.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().return: Size of the current elected validator set.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setBitmapForInterval(uint256,uint256).details: startBlock and endBlock must be in the same epoch.
setBitmapForInterval(uint256,uint256).return: The signature bitmap for the specified interval.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

slash(uint256[],uint256[],uint256[],uint.details: startBlocks[0] will be use as the startBlock of the slashableDowntime.

params.endBlocks: A list of interval end blocks for which signature bitmaps have already been set.
params.groupMembershipHistoryIndex: Group membership index from where the group should be found (For start block).
params.signerIndices: The index of the provided validator for each epoch over which the provided intervals span.
params.startBlocks: A list of interval start blocks for which signature bitmaps have already been set.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set.

validatorSignerAddressFromCurrentSet(uin.return: Address of validator at the requested index.

wasDownForInterval(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Both startBlock and endBlock should be part of the same epoch.

params.signerIndex: Index of the signer within the validator set.

wasDownForInterval(uint256,uint256,uint2.return: True if the validator did not sign any blocks in the specified interval.

params.endBlocks: A list of interval end blocks for which signature bitmaps have already been set.
params.signerIndices: Indices of the signer within the validator set for every epoch change.
params.startBlocks: A list of interval start blocks for which signature bitmaps have already been set.

wasDownForIntervals(uint256[],uint256[],.return: True if the validator signature does not appear in any block within the window.

checkProofOfPossession(address,bytes,byt.notice: Checks a BLS proof of possession.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculate a * b^x for fractions a, b to `decimals` precision

getBitmapForInterval(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates and returns the signature bitmap for the specified interval. This bitmap will contain a one for any validator that signed at least one block in that interval, and zero otherwise.

getEpochNumber().notice: Returns the epoch number at a block.

getEpochNumberOfBlock(uint256).notice: Returns the epoch number at a block.

getEpochSize().notice: Returns the current epoch size in blocks.

getVersionNumber().notice: Returns the storage, major, minor, and patch version of the contract.

groupMembershipAtBlock(address,uint256,u.notice: Returns the group to be slashed.

initialize(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

isBitmapSetForInterval(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns true if the bitmap has been set for the specified interval.

minQuorumSize(uint256).notice: Returns the minimum number of required signers for a given block number.

minQuorumSizeInCurrentSet().notice: Computes byzantine quorum from current validator set size

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().notice: Gets the size of the current elected validator set.

setBitmapForInterval(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates and sets the signature bitmap for the specified interval.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

slash(uint256[],uint256[],uint256[],uint.notice: Slashes a validator that did not sign any blocks for at least `slashableDowntime`.

validatorSignerAddressFromCurrentSet(uin.notice: Gets a validator address from the current validator set.

wasDownForInterval(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Returns true if the validator did not sign any blocks in the specified interval.

wasDownForIntervals(uint256[],uint256[],.notice: Returns true if a validator has been down for the specified overlapping or adjacent intervals.
